content.description: Johanna jogs along a straight path. For 0 ≤ t ≤ 40 , Johanna's velocity is given by a differentiable function v. Selected values of v(t), where t is measured in minutes and v(t) is measured in meters per minute, are given in the table above.
content.question: Use the data in the table to estimate the value of v'(16) .

frqParts.text: Use the data in the table to estimate the value of v'(16) .

topic.text: 2.3: Estimating Derivatives of a Function at a Point

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
